TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit QueryContinueDragEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

public ref class QueryContinueDragEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.DragAction Action { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the current status of the associated drag-and-drop operation.
Docs.value: A member of the enumeration indicating the current status of the associated drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property to `Cancel` if the ESC key is pressed, and sets <xref:System.Windows.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Drop` if the left, middle, or right mouse button is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property to `Cancel` if the ESC key is pressed.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets a flag enumeration indicating the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons.
Docs.value: One or more members of the flag enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The effect of a drag-and-drop operation can be adjusted depending on the state of a particular key. For example, data may either be copied or moved depending on whether the CTRL or SHIFT keys are pressed during the drag-and-drop operation.
